name: Central Florida Flight Training
about: Central Florida Flight Training, part of Bartow Flying Service, has been a premier flight school in Central Florida for over 45 years. Our experienced and professional flight instructors are dedicated to providing efficient and safe training, utilizing modern, well-maintained aircraft in Class D tower controlled airspace. Our fleet includes technologically advanced planes such as the Piper Archer II and Cessna 172 SP, equipped with features like Garmin 1000, autopilot, and electric trim. We offer a range of courses, including introductory flights, private pilot, instrument, multi-engine, commercial, and certified flight instructor programs. With a focus on safety and professionalism, we ensure our students receive comprehensive training to succeed in their aviation careers. Our commitment to excellence and personalized instruction makes us the ideal choice for aspiring pilots. Join us to embark on a successful journey in aviation.
